EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_TorontoOfficeOpening_Q314.New Invitation - August 27
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Pivotal Toronto Office Grand Opening (October 2)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US FOR AN EVENING OF CELEBRATION! Hello
We're opening our doors to celebrate the opening of our new Toronto office space on October 2nd.
To show our appreciation for your support, we'd like to invite you to join industry leaders from across Toronto for an evening of conversation and fun.
We look forward to you joining us for drinks, hors d'oeuvres and entertainment while networking with innovative leaders across multiple industries.
SPACES ARE LIMITED!
Kindly register to reserve your spot. <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email: elogue@pivotal.io <mailto:elogue@pivotal.io>. EVENT DETAILS PIVOTAL OFFICE 1 Toronto St, 11th Floor Toronto, ON Thursday, October 2, 2014 6pm - 9pm REGISTER <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
